description: Update a raw material transaction sales customer
permissions: Admins can update raw material transaction sales customers. Non-admin users can update when they are a member of the related broker; the policy also allows updates when customer or broker is missing, but validations may reject it.
side_effects: Updates a raw material transaction sales customer record.
validation_notes: The raw material transaction sales customer ID argument is required. At least one of --raw-sales-customer-id or --customer must be provided. If provided, --raw-sales-customer-id and --customer cannot be empty. The broker is derived from the customer and must match broker rules. raw_sales_customer_id is unique per broker.
